element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm calculates USLE C factor from a NDVI image, using the following formula:
C = e^(-alpha · NDVI / (beta- NDVI))
where alpha and beta are factor that determine the shape of the C-NDVI curve
To calculate the NDVI image from red and infrared images, use the NDVI algorithm implemented in SEXTANTE.

element.name: ALPHA
element.text: The alpha value in the above formula.

element.name: BETA
element.text: The beta value in the above formula.

element.name: CFACTOR
element.text: The resulting layer with the USLE C Factor
